# The Mistress of the King

|director       = Frederic Zelnik
|producer       = Frederic Zelnik

The Mistress of the King (German: Die Geliebte des KÃ¶nigs) is a 1922 German silent film directed by Frederic Zelnik and starring Lya Mara and Hans Albers. It premiered at the Marmorhaus in Berlin.
The film's sets were designed by the art director Fritz Lederer.
Cast
*Hans Albers
*Erich Kaiser-Titz
*Lya Mara
*Julia Serda
